survey_name: Digital Nomad Co-Working Space Preferences Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand the preferences and needs of digital nomads when selecting co-working spaces, to help providers better cater to this demographic.

questions.question_text: How often do you use co-working spaces as a digital nomad?
questions.client_notes: Use a clear and simple scale to capture frequency accurately. Ensure options cover the full range of possible usage.

script.question_text: How often do you use co-working spaces as a digital nomad?

questions.question_text: What are the most important factors you consider when choosing a co-working space? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Allow respondents to select multiple options but limit to top priorities. Include an 'Other' option for unique needs.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Multi-choice (checkboxes with max selection of 3)

script.question_text: What are the most important factors you consider when choosing a co-working space? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: How much are you willing to pay per day for a co-working space with good amenities?
questions.client_notes: Use realistic price ranges based on global co-working space averages. Ensure options are mutually exclusive.

script.question_text: How much are you willing to pay per day for a co-working space with good amenities?

questions.question_text: What additional services would make a co-working space more appealing to you as a digital nomad?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture unique insights. Keep the text box large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What additional services would make a co-working space more appealing to you as a digital nomad?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current co-working spaces you use?
questions.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who selected 'Daily' or '3-5 times per week' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a standard Likert scale for satisfaction. Ensure the question only appears to frequent users.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Single-choice (radio buttons). Apply skip logic based on Q1 responses.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current co-working spaces you use?
script.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who selected 'Daily' or '3-5 times per week' in Q1
